bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: ①Identical with yan lei 眼淚 . Ming yi bie lu 名醫別錄 Substance Entry zhu 术：風眩頭痛，目淚出 , “Wind dizziness with headache; tears flow”.

② Illness Sign of a continuous flow of tears not stimulated by emotions. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry dai mao 瑇瑁 quotes Hong fei ji lun Ophthalmological book. Ming era, 鴻飛集論 1556. : 迎風目淚：乃心腎虛熱也 , “If one faces wind and develops tears , this is because of depletion heat in the heart and kidneys”. ③ Pathological Condition with a flow of tears as major sign. Shi liao ben cao 食療本草 Substance Entry wu xiong ji 烏雄雞：目淚 出不止者，以三年冠血傅目睛上，日三度 , “When tears flow without end, smear the blood from the comb of a three-year old [black cock] on the eyeballs. Three times a day”.
